talk.author: did:plc:k2yo3yfy2de67yxneei4fi6w
talk.utter: They call 缇茯(Ti fu)（gallade）and 冥科(Ming ke)（bisharp）！Thank you for liking them! ! I am very happy! !☺️☺️☺️☺️😆😆

talk.author: did:plc:ae6vj4qoha3mv6m6o7ro2bjy
talk.utter:
I love their Chinese names!!!! I want to call him 冥科哥哥... I think he's really cool 🥹💓💓 Ti fu feels like he would be a friend to create mischief with 🤭

I think you should just use these names and not give them English ones 😆
Thank you for telling me, it made me happy to learn a little about them! 🥰

talk.utter: 🥺🥺🥺🥹🥹🥹🥹🥹🥹They get along and interact with each other very interesting! I occasionally draw a background story about my OCs! In the form of comics or illustrations!I will also draw about them!😆😆😆😆💗💗💗Thank you for your liking! This is my motivation to continue drawing!✨✨✨

talk.utter:

Please draw more so that I may eat it all!! Yummy! 🥰🥰
